articles.description: The Usos are back together again, and that feels right. Plus, new tag team champions on SmackDown!
articles.content:
Surprise!
It really isnt all that surprising that the Motor City Machine Guns are already over in WWE, considering their talent and the story behind working for all those years before finally making… [+9082 chars]
